limitations.impact: All resources must be in us-east-1

limitations.finding: Console-only access; no CLI or API available
limitations.impact: Cannot automate via CLI or integrate with CI/CD pipelines programmatically

limitations.finding: Web app requires time-limited authentication tokens
Requires GitHub integration; no other SCM support visible
No VPCs, CloudWatch logs, Lambda functions, Secrets, or S3 buckets configured
limitations.impact: Limited context for pentesting; may reduce effectiveness

findings.description: Agent Space successfully created and configured with all three capabilities ready
GitHub integration configured; code review enabled
12 security requirements enabled (11 AWS-managed + 2 custom requirements)
Target domains can be configured and verified for penetration testing
Console-only access limits automation and integration capabilities

strengths: All three core capabilities (Design Review, Code Review, Penetration Testing) are ready
Domain verification process available for both Route 53 and custom domains
Service role automatically created and configured
recommendations: Consider expanding infrastructure context (VPCs, CloudWatch logs) for more effective pentesting
Evaluate custom security requirements for organizational needs
Test web application access for design reviews and pentests
Review code review findings in GitHub repository
